amendment.description: To establish the Commercial Space Activity Advisory Committee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3570 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3570 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3748. To establish the Commercial Space Activity Advisory Committee.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3570 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3570 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
